doc.field: Acker, Kathy. Photocopied typescripts, My Mother: Demonology and Before the Days of Dreaming, with two notes from Acker.
Acker, Kathy. Photocopied typescripts, My Mother: Demonology and Before the Days of Dreaming, with two notes from Acker.

1. 20pp. photocopy of the typescript for selected passages from Acker's book "My Mother: Deomonology" published in 1994, this section subtitled "6. Redoing Childhood: The Beginning of the History of Dreams". The copy displays copies of corrections in Acker's hand, as well as some marginal notation added in an unknown hand. The photocopy was prepared for a recording session of Ms. Acker reading, backed by the female Thrash band "The Tribades"! and is inscribed by Acker in red ink on the cover page "for Susie - all my love, Acker the Pirate".
2. Autograph Note from Acker to the musical director, Ralph Carney, with a large ink drawing of an angry face.
3. 18pp. photocopied typescript entitled "Before the Days of Dreaming" with the indication that is was a "possible text for record".
4. A photocopy of a letter from Acker to the producer Hal Wilner regarding both of the included texts.
Letter sized boxes >> Acker, Kathy. Photocopied typescripts, My Mother: Demonology and Before the Days of Dreaming, with two notes from Acker.
Acker, Kathy. Photocopied typescripts, My Mother: Demonology and Before the Days of Dreaming, with two notes from Acker.
